description: Pre-Meeting Checklist Prompts for APQP Strategic Build Planning

prompts.question: Country of Origin or Melt
prompts.prompt: Are there any restrictions on country of origin or melt for materials? Look for mentions of DFARS, domestic sourcing requirements, country restrictions, or melt origin specifications.

prompts.question: MTR for Weld Wire or Fasteners
prompts.prompt: Are Material Test Reports (MTRs) required for weld wire, fasteners, or other consumables? Look for MTR requirements, material certifications, or traceability requirements for welding consumables and fasteners.

prompts.question: AIS (American Iron and Steel)
prompts.prompt: Are there American Iron and Steel (AIS) requirements? Look for AIS compliance, Buy America provisions, or domestic steel/iron sourcing mandates.

prompts.question: Buy American Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there Buy American Act or similar domestic content requirements? Look for BAA compliance, domestic manufacturing percentages, or US-made component requirements.

prompts.question: ASME Stamps Required
prompts.prompt: Are any ASME stamps or certifications required (U, S, R, PP, etc.)? Look for ASME code requirements, pressure vessel stamps, or boiler certifications.

prompts.question: Piping Codes (B31.1, B31.3, etc.)
prompts.prompt: What piping codes apply to this project? Look for ASME B31.1 (Power Piping), B31.3 (Process Piping), B31.9 (Building Services), or other piping code requirements.

prompts.question: AWS Welding Standards
prompts.prompt: What AWS welding standards or codes apply? Look for AWS D1.1 (Structural Steel), D1.6 (Stainless Steel), or other AWS code requirements and weld procedure specifications.

prompts.question: Weld Restrictions or Special Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there any special welding restrictions or requirements? Look for prohibited weld types, required preheat/PWHT, welder qualification requirements, or weld joint restrictions.

prompts.question: NDE Personnel Certification
prompts.prompt: What certifications are required for NDE/NDT personnel? Look for ASNT Level II/III requirements, SNT-TC-1A compliance, or specific inspector qualification requirements.

prompts.question: General Tolerances
prompts.prompt: What dimensional tolerances are specified? Look for general tolerances, GD&T requirements, or specific dimensional accuracy requirements for fabricated components.

prompts.question: Machining Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there specific machining requirements or surface finish specifications? Look for machining tolerances, surface roughness (Ra values), or precision machining requirements.

prompts.question: Stainless Steel Finishing
prompts.prompt: What finishing requirements exist for stainless steel components? Look for passivation requirements, electropolishing, surface finish grades (#4, #8, etc.), or pickling requirements.

prompts.question: Carbon Steel Finishing
prompts.prompt: What finishing requirements exist for carbon steel components? Look for painting specifications, galvanizing requirements, primer requirements, or coating systems.

prompts.question: Other Finishing Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there any other finishing requirements (anodizing, plating, powder coating, etc.)? Look for special surface treatments, protective coatings, or decorative finishes.

prompts.question: First Article Inspection (FAI)
prompts.prompt: Is First Article Inspection (FAI) required? Look for AS9102 requirements, FAI documentation, or first piece inspection requirements.

prompts.question: Certificate of Conformance (COC)
prompts.prompt: Is a Certificate of Conformance (COC) required? Look for COC requirements, compliance certificates, or conformity documentation requirements.

prompts.question: Inspection Test Plan (ITP)
prompts.prompt: Is an Inspection Test Plan (ITP) required? Look for ITP requirements, quality plans, or inspection and test planning documentation.

prompts.question: Dye Penetrant Testing (DPT/PT)
prompts.prompt: Is Dye Penetrant Testing (PT/DPT) required? Look for liquid penetrant inspection requirements, PT acceptance criteria, or surface crack detection requirements.

prompts.question: Magnetic Particle Testing (MT)
prompts.prompt: Is Magnetic Particle Testing (MT) required? Look for MT inspection requirements, magnetic particle acceptance criteria, or ferromagnetic material inspection.

prompts.question: Radiographic Testing (RT)
prompts.prompt: Is Radiographic Testing (RT) required? Look for X-ray inspection requirements, radiography acceptance criteria, or weld radiograph requirements.

prompts.question: Ultrasonic Testing (UT)
prompts.prompt: Is Ultrasonic Testing (UT) required? Look for ultrasonic inspection requirements, UT acceptance criteria, or thickness verification requirements.

prompts.question: Positive Material Identification (PMI)
prompts.prompt: Is Positive Material Identification (PMI) required? Look for PMI testing requirements, material verification, or alloy confirmation requirements.

prompts.question: Hydrostatic Testing
prompts.prompt: Is hydrostatic testing required? Look for hydro test requirements, pressure test specifications, or leak testing at pressure.

prompts.question: Pneumatic Testing
prompts.prompt: Is pneumatic testing required? Look for air test requirements, pneumatic pressure test specifications, or gas leak testing.

prompts.question: Leak Testing
prompts.prompt: Are there leak testing requirements (bubble test, helium leak, etc.)? Look for leak detection methods, vacuum testing, or seal integrity testing.

prompts.question: Visual Inspection (VT)
prompts.prompt: What visual inspection requirements exist? Look for VT acceptance criteria, surface inspection requirements, or visual examination standards.

prompts.question: Dimensional Inspection
prompts.prompt: What dimensional inspection requirements exist? Look for CMM requirements, measurement protocols, or dimensional verification procedures.

prompts.question: Hardness Testing
prompts.prompt: Is hardness testing required? Look for Rockwell, Brinell, or Vickers hardness requirements, or heat treatment verification.

prompts.question: Third-Party Inspection
prompts.prompt: Is third-party or customer witness inspection required? Look for hold points, witness points, or third-party inspector requirements.

prompts.question: Trial Fit / Fit-Up Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are trial fits or fit-up assemblies required? Look for pre-assembly requirements, fit-up verification, or trial assembly before final welding.

prompts.question: Functional Testing
prompts.prompt: Are functional tests required before shipment? Look for operational testing, performance verification, or functional checkout requirements.

prompts.question: Crating Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there specific crating requirements? Look for wood crate specifications, ISPM-15 requirements, or export crating standards.

prompts.question: Shrink Wrap / Protection
prompts.prompt: Are there shrink wrap or protective wrapping requirements? Look for VCI protection, desiccant requirements, or moisture barrier specifications.

prompts.question: Other Packaging Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are there other packaging or shipping requirements? Look for labeling requirements, shipping orientation, special handling, or preservation requirements.

prompts.question: Data Book / Turnover Package
prompts.prompt: Is a data book or turnover package required? Look for documentation package requirements, as-built documentation, or record retention requirements.

prompts.question: Weld Maps / Weld Logs
prompts.prompt: Are weld maps or weld logs required? Look for weld tracking requirements, weld identification, or weld documentation specifications.

prompts.question: NDE Reports
prompts.prompt: What NDE report formats or requirements exist? Look for NDE documentation standards, report format requirements, or inspection record specifications.

prompts.question: Material Traceability
prompts.prompt: What material traceability requirements exist? Look for heat number tracking, lot traceability, or material identification requirements.

prompts.question: Drawing Submittal Requirements
prompts.prompt: Are drawing submittals or approvals required before fabrication? Look for shop drawing requirements, approval workflows, or drawing revision control.

metadata.notes: Initial set of APQP checklist prompts. Categories and prompts can be modified via admin interface.
